'''Eli Wilson''' is a professor and boyfriend of [[Angela Reilly]].

==History==
Eli met Angela Reilly at the college he teaches at. A while after they started dating, the couple bumped into Angela's dad, Jake, and his girlfriend, Addison, at the movie theatre.

Eli introduced himself as Eli Wilson, PhD. It was clear, however, that Jake did not approve, creating an awkward silence before Angela excused them and they left.

Later in the week, Eli and Angela went to Addison's house for dinner with Jake and Addison. Jake made the situation very uncomfortable after he kept implying that Eli was too old for Angela. Jake excused himself from the table, and Eli followed him to the patio.

Eli told Jake that he has never dated a student before, and Angela is different from other students. This angered Jake more and he told Eli to break off his relationship with Angela or else. And Jake assured him he didn't want to know what "or else" was. ''("[[The World According to Jake]]")''

Eli was set to teach in Rome for a semester, and he invited Angela to come along with him. She happily accepted.

==Relationships==
===Romantic===
Eli is currently dating Angela Reilly, much to her father's disapproval, as he is 30 years older than she is. Jake once threatened him. ''("[[The World According to Jake]]")''

Eli invited Angela to go to Rome with him for a semester. She accepted. ''("[[In Which We Say Goodbye]]")''

==Career==
Eli is a professor of human sexuality at the college that Angela Reilly attends. He went to teach in Rome for a semester.

==Notes and Trivia==
*He's a basketball fan. He likes the Lakers. ''("[[The World According to Jake]]")''
